title: Language Education Design Utilizing STEAM Approaches and Keyword-Based Cluster Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Applying STEAM education approaches to language learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments, enhancing creative problem-solving skills through keyword analysis and cluster-based learning.

learning_goals: Integrate the core elements of STEAM education (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, Mathematics) into language learning contexts.
Derive thematic patterns from educational materials using keyword-based clustering analysis tools.
Design and implement smartphone-based collaborative tasks in a blended learning environment.

resources: Simple Digital Collaboration Tools (KakaoTalk, Google Docs, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
